episode.content: Kagoshima Prefecture, known as the land of brave samurai, was called Satsuma in ancient days. Our cyclist takes in scenic views on his ride along the sea and an active volcano. He discovers jars filled with a local specialty, fermented black vinegar, which make a tart and powerful beverage. In the mountains, he meets a craftswoman who revives old, beautiful buttons. He then finds a secret martial art inherited from samurai. Discover the spirit of this historic land on our 290km ride through Satsuma.
episode.description: Discover the samurai spirit in Kagoshima, named Satsuma in ancient times. In contrast to stoic ways of warriors, arts also blossomed here. Join us on a 290 km trip as we experience culture of samurai.
episode.subtitle: Kagoshima - Legacy of Determination
episode.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
